title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crisp.
Beat eggs with cheese and pepper.
Drain pasta (reserve some cooking water) and combine with pancetta off the heat.
Quickly mix in egg & cheese mixture, adding a splash of pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: 2 tbsp tikka masala spice or a mix of cumin, coriander, paprika
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through.
Prepare sauce with tomatoes, butter and spices.
Simmer chicken in the sauce and finish with cream.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted sourdough topped with smashed avocado, lemon, chili flakes and olive oil.
steps: Toast bread to your liking.
Mash avocado with lemon, salt and pepper.
Spread on toast and finish with chili flakes and olive oil.

title: Beef Stir Fry
summary: Quick stir-fried beef with vegetables and a savory soy-ginger sauce.
steps: Toss beef in cornstarch and a little soy.
High-heat stir-fry beef briefly then remove.
Stir-fry vegetables, add beef back with sauce and finish.

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
summary: A colorful bowl of quinoa, roasted veg, chickpeas, and tahini dressing.
steps: Cook quinoa according to package.
Roast vegetables and season chickpeas.
Assemble bowl and drizzle tahini dressing.
